svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - September 21 2024

title: "Week in Ethereum News
September 21, 2024" date: "2024-09-21"
Eth News and Links
Pectra split into two upgrades with PectrA capped at devnet-3 EIPs & USDS stablecoin live
All core devs
‚Ä¢ All Core Devs ‚Äì Consensus (ACDC) #142 : Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade: Pectra-devnet-3 : issues
found by bad block fuzzer being debugged Pectra split discussion : Pectra scope (PectrA) capped at
EIPs in devnet-3 Second upgrade scope (PectrB) yet to be decided, concerns on scope creep if not
frozen, candidates include PeerDAS & EOF, discussion on including Verkle ahead of EOF and proposal to
add EIP7688 SSZ stable container Client team perspectives: Erigon & Prysm Base proposed Pectra blob
increase : client teams generally support increase of blob target but not max count without PeerDAS,
needs more analysis, IDONTWANT messages should reduce bandwidth PectrA EIP improvements : changes to
validator consolidation in EIP7251, deposit flow in EIP6110, attestation refactoring in EIP7549 and
opaque requests in EIP7685
‚Ä¢ Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade: Pectra-devnet-3 : issues found by bad block fuzzer being debugged
Pectra split discussion : Pectra scope (PectrA) capped at EIPs in devnet-3 Second upgrade scope
(PectrB) yet to be decided, concerns on scope creep if not frozen, candidates include PeerDAS & EOF,
discussion on including Verkle ahead of EOF and proposal to add EIP7688 SSZ stable container Client
team perspectives: Erigon & Prysm Base proposed Pectra blob increase : client teams generally support
increase of blob target but not max count without PeerDAS, needs more analysis, IDONTWANT messages
should reduce bandwidth PectrA EIP improvements : changes to validator consolidation in EIP7251,
deposit flow in EIP6110, attestation refactoring in EIP7549 and opaque requests in EIP7685

should reduce bandwidth

‚Ä¢ Pectra scope (PectrA) capped at EIPs in devnet-3

stable container

max count without PeerDAS, needs more analysis, IDONTWANT messages should reduce bandwidth

‚Ä¢ PectrA EIP improvements : changes to validator consolidation in EIP7251, deposit flow in EIP6110,
attestation refactoring in EIP7549 and opaque requests in EIP7685
PectrA EIP improvements : changes to validator consolidation in EIP7251, deposit flow in EIP6110,
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade
‚Ä¢ Pectra testing call #5 : Builder specs & remote signer API need updating and more clients ready for
EOF devnet
Pectra testing call #5 :
‚Ä¢ Builder specs & remote signer API need updating and more clients ready for EOF devnet
‚Ä¢ Consensus-specs v1.5.0-alpha.6 : minor fixes for Electra, PeerDAS & ePBS
Consensus-specs v1.5.0-alpha.6 : minor fixes for Electra, PeerDAS & ePBS
‚Ä¢ EOF implementers call #58 : Discussions on EIP7761 HASCONTRACT for ERC721/1155 NFTs, EXTCALL return
codes and allowing EXTDELEGATECALL to legacy
EOF implementers call #58 :
‚Ä¢ Discussions on EIP7761 HASCONTRACT for ERC721/1155 NFTs, EXTCALL return codes and allowing
EXTDELEGATECALL to legacy
‚Ä¢ PeerDAS breakout #8 : Debugging local devnet forking issues before launching peerdas-devnet-2
Validity custody is main remaining spec change before shipping
PeerDAS breakout #8 :
‚Ä¢ Debugging local devnet forking issues before launching peerdas-devnet-2
Debugging local devnet forking issues before launching peerdas-devnet-2
‚Ä¢ Validity custody is main remaining spec change before shipping
‚Ä¢ Distributed block building call #0 video : discussed Dankrad‚Äôs proposal to gossip sample proofs
Distributed block building call #0 video : discussed Dankrad‚Äôs proposal to gossip sample proofs
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
‚Ä¢ üö® Lido at 28.1% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
üö® Lido at 28.1% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
‚Ä¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority Consensus layer:
Prysm 37% Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
‚Ä¢ Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority
Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority
‚Ä¢ Consensus layer: Prysm 37%
Consensus layer: Prysm 37%
‚Ä¢ Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
‚Ä¢ Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Layer 1
‚Ä¢ ePBS slot auctions don‚Äôt satisfy No Trusted Advantage
ePBS slot auctions don‚Äôt satisfy No Trusted Advantage
‚Ä¢ Terence: FOCIL resource considerations
Terence: FOCIL resource considerations
‚Ä¢ Potuz: proposal to decouple execution & consensus layer syncing
Potuz: proposal to decouple execution & consensus layer syncing
‚Ä¢ P√©ter Szil√°gyi: SSZ v0.3.0 (library in Go): adds monolithic type support, fixes decoding zero-length
dynamic arrays and adds SizeSSZ

‚Ä¢ SSZ deserialization differences disclosed between Prysm & Lighthouse

Research
‚Ä¢ Variable orbit single slot finality with circular & spiral finality : review of cumulative
committee-based finality under fast-rotating validator committees and avenues to reduce aggregate
finality gap
Client Releases
‚Ä¢ Consensus layer: Lodestar v1.22.0 : minor performance optimizations including shortening startup
time
Consensus layer:
‚Ä¢ Lodestar v1.22.0 : minor performance optimizations including shortening startup time
‚Ä¢ Execution layer: Besu v24.9.1 : adds client version info for consensus layer graffiti Geth v1.14.9 :
adds multicall (eth_simulateV1) support Reth v1.0.7 : adds multicall (eth_simulateV1) support
Execution layer:
‚Ä¢ Besu v24.9.1 : adds client version info for consensus layer graffiti
Besu v24.9.1 : adds client version info for consensus layer graffiti

Layer 2
‚Ä¢ Hildobby: L2 blob usage , pruned blobs ~30GB & full history 275GB

Fractional reserve token ERC7771 : Router proxy ERC7772 : Partial gas sponsorship

Stuff for developers
‚Ä¢ Foundry decode internal : trace internal function calls & generate flamegraph/chart
Foundry decode internal : trace internal function calls & generate flamegraph/chart
‚Ä¢ Tevm cast : browser based CLI similar to Foundry cast
Tevm cast : browser based CLI similar to Foundry cast

v2.0.11 : adds Blockscout verification

‚Ä¢ Privacy and Scaling Explorations (PSE): Barry Whitehat leaving, Sam Richards taking over & some
projects sunsetting

gwei 12k ETH net issuance this week

Notable at app layer
‚Ä¢ Sky (formerly Maker) USDS stablecoin & SKY governance token live on mainnet

Regulation/business/tokens
‚Ä¢ US SEC end of fiscal year actions: FlyfishClub settled for selling NFT restaurant memberships prior
to opening Commissioners Peirce & Uyeda : ‚Äúsecurities laws are not needed here, and their application
is harmful both in the present case and as future precedent‚Äù Rari Capital charged with misleading
investors & acting as unregistered brokers Prager Metis (auditors) settled for negligence in FTX
audits
